turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, could you please order me a coffee drink from Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely! Which location would you like me to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on 10th street in Colorado Springs, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right, I can do that. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order the Black and White Mocha, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, you would like the Black and White Mocha. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order the short one, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One short Black and White Mocha. Got it! What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please tell them to give me whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whole milk, okay. Did you want whipped cream with the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I do, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will there be anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh! Actually, I want to order extra whipped cream, please!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. I will add that you wish extra whipped cream. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know what, make it a tall one, instead of a short one!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. One tall Black and White Mocha with whole milk and extra whipped cream!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right, then! You drink is on order at the Starbucks on 10th Street in Colorado Springs! It will be ready for pick-up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome! What about my receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device as a text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Very good. Thank you for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! Glad to help. Goodbye!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
